--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit/KitKat2::
> 
> He came back to the computers room, just as Shivah said all that.
> "Ok. By the way, I put that bot in a CR tank."
> DrillBit then presses a button on a computer, opening a comm to the
> whole base.
> "This is commander DrillBit, an enemy has been sighted, heading this
> way. Prepare for battle!"
> 
> KitKat wakes up, from the comm mesage.
> "Oh hell. Here we go again."
> She grabs her blaster, and starts running to the computer room.
